template.subject: URGENT: 51+ Dead in Iran Protests Since December 28 - Coverage Needed
template.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

Since December 28, 2025, massive protests have erupted across Iran following the government's announcement of fuel price increases. The response has been devastating:

â€¢ 51+ protesters killed by security forces
â€¢ Over 2,270 people detained
â€¢ Nationwide internet blackout to suppress information
â€¢ Reports of live ammunition used against crowds

As a concerned member of the Iranian diaspora in {{senderCountry}}, I urge you to cover this humanitarian crisis. The world needs to know what is happening.

The Iranian people are risking their lives for basic freedoms. Your coverage can help shine a light on these events and potentially save lives.

Sincerely,
A concerned citizen

variations.subject: Iran Crisis: Over 50 Killed in Ongoing Protests - Urgent Media Attention Required
variations.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am writing to bring your attention to the escalating crisis in Iran. Since late December 2025, peaceful protests have been met with extreme violence:

â€¢ More than 51 fatalities confirmed by human rights organizations
â€¢ 2,270+ arbitrary detentions
â€¢ Complete internet shutdown across the country
â€¢ Security forces firing on unarmed civilians

As someone from {{senderCountry}} with deep ties to Iran, I implore your organization to investigate and report on these events. International attention is crucial.

The people of Iran deserve to have their voices heard.

With respect,
A member of the Iranian diaspora

variations.subject: Breaking: Mass Protests in Iran - 51+ Dead, 2,270+ Detained
variations.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out regarding the ongoing humanitarian crisis in Iran that began on December 28, 2025.

Key facts:
â€¢ At least 51 protesters have been killed
â€¢ Over 2,270 individuals are in detention
â€¢ A total internet blackout is preventing information flow
â€¢ Security forces have used lethal force against peaceful demonstrators

From {{senderCountry}}, I watch with horror as my homeland descends into violence. Your reporting could make a difference in bringing international pressure to bear.

Thank you for considering this urgent request.

Best regards,
A concerned citizen of {{senderCountry}}

targetingRationale.en: These journalists and media outlets have extensive experience covering human rights issues and international crises. They have the reach and credibility to bring global attention to the situation in Iran.
